```{r}
Mat1
```
```{r}
Mat2 <- matrix(c("a","b","c","d"),2,2)
Mat2
class(Mat2)
typeof(Mat2)
Mat2[[2]]
Mat2[c(T,F,F,T)]
```

```{r}
StuList <- list(
  學號=c(172,214,322,425,517),
  姓名=c("小明","大雄","胖虎","小新","大白"),
  成績=c(80,60,90,70,50)
  )
StuList 
```

```{r}
StuDF <- data.frame(
  學號=c(172,214,322,425,517),
  姓名=c("小明","大雄","胖虎","小新","大白"),
  成績=c(80,60,90,70,50)
  )
StuDF 
```
StuDF其實在R中其實是list
```{r}
class(StuDF)
typeof(StuDF)
```

```{r}
StuDF[[2]][[3]]
```

```{r}
class(StuDF$姓名)
```
```{r}
StuDF$姓名 <- as.character(StuDF$姓名)
class(StuDF$姓名)
```
```{r}
StuDF2 <- data.frame(
  學號=c(172,214,322,425,517),
  姓名=c("小明","大雄","胖虎","小新","大白"),
  成績=c(80,60,90,70,50),
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
  )
StuDF2 
```

```{r}
class(StuList)
```

```{r}
as.data.frame(StuList) -> StuDF3
class(StuDF3)
```
```{r}
StuDF3
```
取消內定character為factor的方式：as.data.frame(..., stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```{r}
as.data.frame(StuList,stringsAsFactors = F) -> StuDF4
class(StuDF4)
```
```{r}
StuDF4
```
